website_summaries.verdict: The perfect sized set of speakers for your desk, or other small areas in your home, at a reasonable price point.
pros: Sound quality is clear, and louder than expected considering the compact size
Build quality is unexpectedly strong with some good weight to the speakers
Option to plug devices in directly to the speaker through a headphone jack
cons: Experienced some feedback at max volume – we suggest not exceeding 85% of the max volume, for the clearest listening experience

customer_reviews.title: Yamaha Computer speakers
customer_reviews.text: Great sound from small speakers. Replaced my old Altec-Lansing set with a subwoofer. I tried the Bose speakers but they were rather muted and had overdone bass. These have a brighter midrange and a really nice bass. Perfect for my desktop computer. Build quality is really nice with metal grills and a real solid feel. Sleep when computer is off and start up with no problems or delays. Headphone jack in front is very convenient. Great sounding speakers at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Paul S

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal 2.0 speakers
customer_reviews.text: These are phenomenal speakers¡ far the best for value. These hit high’s and mid’s exquisitely, and bass just right. These are not suited for bass heads, albeit I considered myself one of them but due to the nature of living in the apartment I got too many complaints from neighbors with my 5.1 Logitech set up I move down to these bad boys. They sound loud enough to fill your living room. These sound even better when hook on my creative sound card which make everything sound live/crystal clear as if I’m in the studio.
customer_reviews.author: Ultra Mario

customer_reviews.title: Better than Bose Companion Series II
customer_reviews.text: I have a Bose Companion Series II and wanted another pair for my second desktop. When I first got the NX-50, I was not that impressed with the sound. Yet when I compared NX-50 with the Bose, I immediately noticed the difference. The NX-50 sound feels much more "accurate" and even 3D. Bose is, like what others said, muddy and the left/right channels are not as separate as the NX-50. NX-50's other features - auto standby, power button separate from volume, and able to take 2 input sources, is another plus from the Bose. I highly recommend the NX-50 over the Bose.
customer_reviews.author: shadowmagic

customer_reviews.title: it all sounded wonderful to me
customer_reviews.text: Not a techie review here. I hooked these up to my laptop in no time flat and went right to Pandora. I tried Old rock music, Bach, Gregorian Chants, classic folk music...it all sounded wonderful to me. Low volume to high I was still enjoying the music. :) I then listen to an old George Carlin comedy clip and some of Game of Thrones. Loved the sound of it all, Music was great, voices were clear. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MJS

customer_reviews.title: crank up volume = distorted music
customer_reviews.text: loud speaker but cannot handle volume all the way up. sound quality is distorted. after listening for 15 minutes gave me a headache. I have an old bose companion speakers maybe over 10 yrs old and still enjoyed listening to it with full volume. Has cleaner sound output without distortion. Read a lot of good reviews that made me buy this but ended up disappointed. Will call amazon for help with returns.
customer_reviews.author: Mas

customer_reviews.title: Better than the Bose
customer_reviews.text: I read the other reviews, and I've personally tried these next to the Bose Companion 2 Series III... The sound the two make are almost identical, but the Yamaha is more full sounding. Plus the actual feel of the speakers/knob is just better. A+ Yamaha.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: if you want to get / upgrade computer speakers I highly recommend these. The accuracy / precision of the NX-B55 ...
customer_reviews.text: Yamaha did it again with the NX-B55 ... if you want to get / upgrade computer speakers I highly recommend these. The accuracy / precision of the NX-B55 is really optimal. Perhaps the 7 inch depth of these speakers gives room for larger magnets / coils in these. The cone materials must also be exceptional (no flexing to introduce harmonic distortion). These go very loud also ... with the volume knob at 50% on the speaker and the computer volume at 40% they are quite loud.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I got these speakers to hook up to my Amazon Echo Spot. Amazing sound well balanced with just the right amount of base. Like the standby mode eliminating the need to turn speakers off and on every time. If you’re looking for a set of high guality well built speakers look no further these are the best hands down.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie

customer_reviews.title: They sound fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I have these speakers on my desk and they sound amazing. It was a bit of a stretch for me to justify the money but I am SO glad I did. I do like listening to music all day so for me the value is a no-brainer. As a bonus, the speakers have two inputs so I use one for my computer and have an Amazon Alexa input plugged into the other input, which is super convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality for the price - consider before buying others
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound, super clean and crisp. Well built and sturdy. Yamaha is very good at this type of speaker- fills whole house with sound fo a bit over $100, pretty amazing value. I have three systems, each with different speakers. 1. Yamaha NX 50s 2. Bose companions 3. Logitech Z200. Hands down the Yamahas are the best. Bose have great clarity, but suffer in the mid tones and bass. Logitech are pretty good - especially for $30. Spend the extra cash and buy the NX 50s or save some $ and buy the Logitechs.
customer_reviews.author: Goodstuff

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the price but don't expect the world
customer_reviews.text: It ain't the highest end sound so the treble isn't as lovely and the bass isn't as strong as other more expensive speakers, but the mid range is clean and clear. I wouldn't use them to listen to music all day, but for piano to practice tap dance, examples of stride piano, and the infinite youtube videos with music, I find them a pleasure to use. Oh yeah, and they have a relatively compact size and efficiently planned shape.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Chocolate

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Speakers!
customer_reviews.text: I considered buying some higher priced speakers such as the Bose, but after reading online reviews these speakers kept coming up as "as good" or better for the money. So I purchased these and I am NOT disappointed. They have a great range and clear sound that is everything I wanted for the money. Excellent product and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Monroe

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic computer speakers -  wonderful sound
customer_reviews.text: I got these to bolster my new WFH setup in my home office and they are truly outstanding. I have never experienced such excellent sound from a desktop speaker before, or for such great value! I considered buying the Bluetooth model for $100 extra but I don't mind the audio wire at all. Would highly recommend these for anyone looking for quality sound out of their PC.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Bette

customer_reviews.title: Big rich sound in small affordable speakers...
customer_reviews.text: I gave these a serious test as soon as they arrived, and virtually spent the entire afternoon enjoying such a rich sound coming from such small laptop speakers...jazz, rock, latino music, eclectic, blues...it all sounds great, and I'm very critical so take my word for it. If you're looking for a big sound from affordable laptop speakers, you gotta give these a try!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: For an average bedroom these are great and maybe even overkill
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant about getting speakers without a subwoofer, especially as I got these to replace a soundbar with a subwoofer component. They've blown me away. For an average bedroom these are great and maybe even overkill. I was taken aback by the sound quality as well as how loud they were able to get without noticeable distortion.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Clear, but no bass
customer_reviews.text: I've enjoyed some <$100 computer speakers with a subwoofer for 20 years. Since I already own a Yamaha receiver with 5.1 surround, a Yamaha soundbar that I'm pleased with and paired with the positive reviews for these I thought they would be a good way to go. Unfortunately, these don't have the punch I like. These speakers would be great for background music or the beeps, dings and dong alerts of a computer but not for movies, gaming or jam sessions. I decided to return them and go for the Logitech Z623.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No Bose about it...
customer_reviews.text: Love these speakers. Very powerful without the added woofer (?) box. Perfect for my needs here at the computer, and I am a big BOSE fan, but these fit the bill. Only wish I had seen the purple ones before I ordered the basic black but they still sound great.
customer_reviews.author: mec

customer_reviews.title: these speakers have pretty good sound without much bass
customer_reviews.text: As expressed in other reviews, these speakers have pretty good sound without much bass. The bass is pretty good considering the size of the speakers, but many would prefer a subwoofer to supplement the bass. Build quality seems to be very good.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Brown

customer_reviews.title: My New Yamaha NX-50 PC Speakers
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and considering their small size, puts out a very good sound. Bass is very good without the bass box that I used before and speakers work well with high as well as low volume. They appear to be made very well and have a very solid feel to both the speakers. Being relative small, they fit well on top of my desk without taking up too much room. Sounds good with classical music as well as with voice.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Youngblood

customer_reviews.title: Great sound... better than Bose
customer_reviews.text: Love these little speakers. They have good bass and good high end as well. I also own the Bose Companion 2 Series III, but I think these sound much better.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous.
customer_reviews.text: First time I used them I was interrupted by a knock at the front door. No one was there. It was the extraordinary stereo effects of the speakers! I don't play music so I can't judge that but simply for streaming moves etc on my computer they are terrific.
customer_reviews.author: civisamericanasum

customer_reviews.title: Better than I could've hoped
customer_reviews.text: I'm really impressed with the fullness and richness of sound coming out of such small speakers. The sound is very clear and I'm not hearing any of the static or distortion mentioned in the most popular critical review. The one thing I'd complain about is the connection is a single 3.5mm intended for a headphone jack instead of the standard surround sound array on the back of a desktop. Overall very pleased with this purchase, I was your between these and the Bose Companion 2 and I have no regrets choosing these.
customer_reviews.author: Adamant

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, small package!
customer_reviews.text: These speakers sound really good. I am thankful I read a review here before purchasing another set of Bose desktop speakers. I've always been happy with my Bose but I didn't realize how much better these Yamaha speakers could be! They've set the new standard quality sound in our household. Nice balanced sound, noticeably better clarity and bass response than other small powered desktop speakers I've used.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Crisp and Clear Speakers
customer_reviews.text: I have significant hearing loss and don't hear much above 2K. These speakers along with a Sound Blaster card ($40) give me what I need to be able to hear the voices in movies on my PC. I knock the bass down with the Sound Blaster equalizer and jack up the higher end. With the crisp/ clear speaker sound I have set up equalizer curves for movies, music and sports. At last I can hear what is being said. Don't waste your $$$ on the $40 cheap stuff. Thanks to Ark L for his review above.
customer_reviews.author: Ross in Pasadena

customer_reviews.title: Very stylish and solid build; only so-so sound
customer_reviews.text: Very stylish and solid build; easy to pack and port. Only so-so sound; which surprised me as I have many Yamaha components. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Michael W.

customer_reviews.title: Killer sweet speakers!
customer_reviews.text: Killer sweet speakers! I just unpacked these and hooked them up and they're awesome! Okay, I'm sure there are better speakers out there somewhere (there's always something better, right? and my ears are admittedly rather old...), but for the price of these I'm blown away. I had no idea how crappy my old Labtec speakers were. Good base, good midrange, good highs. Just the right size. Seriously well made casings. Would spend the money again without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: C & J

customer_reviews.title: Replaced my aging Bose speakers
customer_reviews.text: I do video work. I had an old set of Bose speakers and they did the job well for many years. When they stopped working, I bought these to fill in. They do a good job, and they do it for a much more reasonable price. I'm satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: tramborder

customer_reviews.title: excellent sound, no tone/balance control or blue tooth.
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice speakers. I can hear sounds and instruments that I never heard before in music that I've listened to for years. They do distort at high end volume, so if you're looking for speakers to blow the doors off your house these won't be a good choice. There is no balance or tone control and no blue tooth, but the sound quality is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I bought these speakers for use with my computer. Whether I'm listening to a CD or music videos on YouTube the sound is absolutely awesome especially for just over $100. My office is small (less than 100 sq ft) but at 1/3 volume these speakers are loud, clear, full range with way more clear bass than I thought possible from such a small speaker. I am very impressed with these and I am very picky when it comes to sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: Powerful Sound - GREAT PRICE
customer_reviews.text: Really love these speakers. Full sound with a lot of range. Can't beat the price. I highly recommend these speakers.
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: BROKE IN 8 MONTHS!
customer_reviews.text: IMPORTANT UPDATE- I loved these speakers when I 1st got them. They sounded great. Sadly, they broke within 8 months. I consider these expensive speakers. This is so unfair! I hope Amazon lets this review stay.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Love These Speakers
customer_reviews.text: I love these computer speakers. They sound great and have all the range I want for my office. I obviously haven't played them side by side with the comparable Bose product, but they sure sound good to me and I think I got great value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Clear sound, especially in speech range
customer_reviews.text: These are nice little speakers that supply a big sound without too much emphasis on bass. I bought them because I am now using my computer for meetings and my old speakers just didn't do well in the speech range. These are excellent. Voices are clear and bright. Volume control knob and headphone jack on the front are easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: David Friedman

customer_reviews.title: Broken headphone jack
customer_reviews.text: speakers sound good, but having issues with the headphone jack. if i plug in the headphone cable all the way in, the sound is distorted but if slightly wiggle it out then sounds fine. not a huge deal but something you shouldn't have to deal with with $100 speakers. would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ZL

customer_reviews.title: Good quality sound, loud and clear - let them run in for a few days.
customer_reviews.text: At the start they were very sibilant but I experimented a bit with their distance from the back wall and let them play for a few days and they settled down. I use them with an off board DAC and am very pleased with the sound. Detailed and enough bass without sounding manufactured or lumpy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good sound and stereo imaging for non-hifi PC speakers
customer_reviews.text: If these had a little bit more bass, and would "turn on" a bit quicker when an audio signal is sent to them, they would have earned 5 stars. But for my PC use (i.e. non hi-fi use), they sound OK for what I need.
customer_reviews.author: SEB

customer_reviews.title: MUFFLED SOUND!
customer_reviews.text: People were saying how "crisp" these are, that is a massive LIE! These are pretty muffled, the build quality looks nice but the speaker sound is just muffled
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: No auto shut off
customer_reviews.text: I like these speakers a whole lot. They provide great sound. Just wish they were a little smaller (like half the size) and provided an auto shut off function.
customer_reviews.author: C.P.

customer_reviews.title: Works well connected to my TV
customer_reviews.text: Like the auto snooze function, when not in use, goes to sleep and wakes when the tv comes on. Compact platform, decent sound.
customer_reviews.author: ValricoJoe

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I love Yamaha but these as computer speakers are by far the worst I have ever own flat sound just nothing and for the price is very sad.
customer_reviews.author: lakelandguy

customer_reviews.title: Great, expansive sound.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the NX 50 after having a less than impressive experience with Logitech. The sound is more expansive, and for an office, I don't miss the subwoofer. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Moseley

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely not worth the price point!
customer_reviews.text: Do your home work or blow your money, these should be priced for about 1/3rd the current rate. Dozens of better options available. Really lousy speakers! Shameful product, won't buy anything Yamaha again as a result of this regretful purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dad

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, good price, easy to hook up. I looked for a while and settled on these because of the reviews. I'm glad I got these because the reviews were on the money.
customer_reviews.author: mike j

customer_reviews.title: Great sound.
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from really old speakers. The sound is great, slightly orgasmic, like I was listening to music for the first time, again. If you're using these speakers for PC like I am, the bass makes my desk slightly vibrate, like little vibrators for my hands. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Siven Li

customer_reviews.title: Good speakers
customer_reviews.text: Sound is very good. Not sure how good they are at max volume, but for everyday listening, they are great.
customer_reviews.author: allan logan

customer_reviews.title: Good, not great speaker. WAY overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Theyre not bad speakers but seriously not worth the price. You can buy speakers for 1/3 the price that play louder, clearer and dont "clip out" like these do. Anyone who really knows anything about speakers and audio will agree with me
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for these speakers but they sounded absolutely terrible. Tinny, with nearly no bass. The speakers themselves are very lightweight. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: JMG

customer_reviews.title: Great choice for the money
customer_reviews.text: the last 2 sets we had for the home computer were Yamaha. we are always happy with this brand
customer_reviews.author: mihail34

customer_reviews.title: Impressive sound
customer_reviews.text: I've been really impressed with the sound you get from these speakers considering the size. They have a great sound stage and great bass. Pair them up with a good DAC (I'm using the Fiio E10K which has a line out) and you're going to be in for a treat.
customer_reviews.author: jayac

customer_reviews.title: Huge Upgrade
customer_reviews.text: These speakers replaced some Dell speakers that came with my system and all I can say is Wow! Huge improvement especially in the left and right channel separation. I would definitely purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Mullins

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good sounding
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good sounding, easy to hook up. Wish there was a little more low end. Bought them mainly to actually be able to hear bass when watching music performances. Certainly better than the horrible sound that comes out of today's flat screens.
customer_reviews.author: JimFree

customer_reviews.title: Great set of speakers
customer_reviews.text: These are pricey and not extremely loud but have great bass for their size. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: polarred21

customer_reviews.title: Just ... Wow.
customer_reviews.text: The fidelity on this little set of speakers is plain amazing. Moving up to the $100 price point improves the experience greatly, kudos to Yamaha for keeping the their quality on par with the snobbish companies out there. The metal grilles were an unexpected quality touch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome pair of speakers. They are well worth the money for a PC set of speakers without a mini-sub
customer_reviews.author: M. Flinn

customer_reviews.title: BLU TOOTH SPEAKERS
customer_reviews.text: WORK AND SOUND FANTASTIC! No need to plug in the cable anymore when I come into the room YAHOO!
customer_reviews.author: Dutchman

customer_reviews.title: They produce nice sound and I am happy with their performance
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these Speakers to listen to music on my desk top Tower. They produce nice sound and I am happy with their performance. I’m not an Audiophile so I can’t comment on the technical aspects of the Speakers. However the sound is crisp and they do produce a nice base sound. They are solidly built and were easy to hookup.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Very good sound.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and the speakers work well with a variety of devices.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Stahl

customer_reviews.title: good speakers best so far after 2 other sets be good for long while
customer_reviews.text: Like the sound quality with just about the right amount of bass for me well made sturdy, look good, quality seems outstanding..could be a little less money but seen them for more elsewhere so ok Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: I don't understand why this product is 4 stars.
customer_reviews.text: Compared to Bose Companion 2 (Which is also about 100 too) NX-50's sound has less mass. Very powerful speaker in 100 dollars. Around 100 dollars, this speaker is the best one you can find.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They really do have good sound. Easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Cherry Brandstater

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good for music but too much bass for normal talking sound
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great upgrade!
customer_reviews.text: Surprised how well these work. Nice bass and highs, plenty loud. Yamaha always makes good stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Brentasaurus

customer_reviews.title: Sound is good
customer_reviews.text: Based off reviews, I went with these instead of Bose. Glad I did, I am happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Barr

customer_reviews.title: best computer speakers.
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best computer speakers i've ever used in 30 yrs.
customer_reviews.author: tfbrn692

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Speakers
customer_reviews.text: Great computer speakers! They have amazing sound quality, and the dual input is pretty nifty. When you turn them up the sound quality doesn't distort either. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Wang

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers
customer_reviews.text: For a speaker that does not include a sub it's perfect sounds is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: For the price you can't beat them
customer_reviews.text: Excellent computer speakers. Sound quality is very very good for the price you can't beat them.
customer_reviews.author: stokesrb

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding speaker
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and great value. This is a very high quality product from Japan. This pair of speakers will serve you well for years. Beautifully made which exudes a high quality feel and look. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: nguyen, vu hung

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: it just works as advertised and I like it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Carl B Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Sound
customer_reviews.text: It is true. The sound is impeccable. Great value for the price. I'm so glad I got these.
customer_reviews.author: Hanny

customer_reviews.title: Love the Yamaha line
customer_reviews.text: Yamaha usually puts out a great product.. but these speakers gave me a headache that lasted two days. No clarity.. no Bass. Sounds just like they look in a box.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Lombardo

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful speakers!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful speakers with deep bass and good treble. The auto power off is a very convenient feature and it works as claimed. Very attractive speakers to place on either side of my Mac. I might purchase another pair to hook to my television.
customer_reviews.author: Tom In ABQ

customer_reviews.title: Weak sauce
customer_reviews.text: These little speakers pack no punch at all. The sound is very thin considering the size and cost. I’m returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delighted with this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace an aging pair of Yamaha pc speakers I bought over 12 years ago. Impressive sound from a smaller, more beautiful package.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had my speakers for about 8 days now. I’am very satisfied.Makes my lap top sound like a high dollar stereo.Was planning to buy a sub later on,but don’t think I need it now.I would recommend these speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Routh

customer_reviews.title: Worth it, in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: I'm not an audiophile but I think the sound quality is pretty good in relation to size and price. Sounds starts to get a little distorted or crackly if you pump the volume too high but you can probably expect that from many speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: The sound is clear and nearly perfect. It's stong enough when you need to turn ...
customer_reviews.text: The sound is clear and nearly perfect. It's stong enough when you need to turn it up. it's a little mighty might.
customer_reviews.author: MUSIC MITCH

customer_reviews.title: Great Speakers, annoying humm while off
customer_reviews.text: Speakers sound great, for their small size even. Made annoying hiss while not playing audio, I couldn’t unhear it. Returned for this reason. Bose Companion 2 had the same problem
customer_reviews.author: Evan Freymiller

customer_reviews.title: Gotta have that bass!
customer_reviews.text: Was going to order Bose pair but a review recommended the Yamaha. No buyers remorse. Great sound, especially that much wanted deep bass, for my computer needs.
customer_reviews.author: Augustus

customer_reviews.title: too much bass, couldnt understand anything spoken
customer_reviews.text: No way to control the bass, way too much,horrible distorts talking hated them, and returned them
customer_reviews.author: ciindy laduke

customer_reviews.title: Nice speakers
customer_reviews.text: Really digging these speakers. Great sound, really nice look, I use them on both a turntable and my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary P. Imoehl

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Very full and rich sound. These speakers pack a punch in a small package. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: N. G.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The speakers are simply amazing, a whole new sound experience.!!!
customer_reviews.author: Questions

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Speakers
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding speakers, very loud and comparable to the Bose computers speakers (which I own).
customer_reviews.author: Silvio Sage

customer_reviews.title: Good speakers
customer_reviews.text: I like the speakers. A remote control would be nice.
customer_reviews.author: W. White

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Great sounding speakers have them set up on my computer in the warehouse and they sound great
customer_reviews.author: Alvaro Delgado

customer_reviews.title: An AD from a Paying Customer.
customer_reviews.text: These speakers sing to me with the sound of music. The quality is top notch. For all you people out there who are thinking about buying these Yamaha speakers, you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Richard Eaton

customer_reviews.title: Great Choice!  !
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! How the other leading manufacturers could not work as well nor give an automated shut off as you shut down the computer.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Bass-tastic!
customer_reviews.text: These computer speakers are excellent, you can hear the bass very clearly in these; whereas in other cheaper brands you can barely hear it at all / hear a very tinny bass. All songs are given new life.
customer_reviews.author: G. Shamblen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome desk speakers!
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous sound. Great speakers. Bought them for my boss and she is very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: M. Idrissi

customer_reviews.title: Too much bass
customer_reviews.text: Sounds terrific. A little too much bass and not enough high end. I wish the units had bass and treble control. I especially like the auto on and off. The headphone jack, volume control, and power button are in the middle of the unit; this is a really good design feature because of ease of access.
customer_reviews.author: DS-Says

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: These speakers met my expectations. They sound better than the ones I replaced that were a decade old. I listen to Amazon Music and Itunes on my computer, and the sound produced by these speakers is great for me. They are worth the money, but aren't top-of-the-line. I'd recommend them to anyone looking to update their speakers at a reasonable cost.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Winn

customer_reviews.title: but these are great speakers! thanks
customer_reviews.text: I am not a sound expert, but these are great speakers! thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Melih Eken

customer_reviews.title: Also the automatic shut off and turn on works great. It`s like wearing a pair of headphones without ...
customer_reviews.text: I use these to watch music videos at full volume and they are crystal clear. Also the automatic shut off and turn on works great. It`s like wearing a pair of headphones without the discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: andy anderson

customer_reviews.title: What you will like > Compact size > Blue tooth makes it easy ...
customer_reviews.text: What you will like > Compact size > Blue tooth makes it easy to switch across multiple input sources > Sounds really good for its size
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will not wake up automatically
customer_reviews.text: Good range at low volume using as computer speakers. Unfortunately, they will not automatically wake up when the computer is turned on. You have to turn the speakers off and on with the power button to revive them. I've only tried them on a Intel NUC 6i5SYH.
customer_reviews.author: TGC

customer_reviews.title: and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a pair of Logitech speakers that I thought rocked. These speakers take rocking to a whole new level. Very well made, and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: don_wallace

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sound quality at low levels. Not the best at higher ones.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Goodguy

customer_reviews.title: A steep price, but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: While there are many other speakers out there that are cheaper, they fall short of par compared to the NX-50. If you're willing to spend up to around $150~ USD on speakers that can be used for either your computer, television, or sound system, these won't disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Jones

customer_reviews.title: High musicality. Clarity and separation.
customer_reviews.text: High musicality. Clarity and separation. If you love music get these.
customer_reviews.author: Venu

product_meta.title: Yamaha NX-B55 Premium Computer Speakers with Bluetooth,Black
product_meta.description: Style:Premium Speakers with BluetoothNot your ordinary small speaker system, the NX-B55 employs a unique cabinet shape and front-ported design that delivers exceptional frequency response with clear sound fields. A perfect companion for your PC or Mac, these powered speakers also work great with iPad, iPhone and Android devices.
feature_bullets: Bluetooth and mini-jack with auto-mix, play two sources at once
Convenient front-panel volume control and headphone jack
Auto standby eliminates need to turn system on and off
Sharp-looking design with solid build and metal grilles
Also can be used for TV speakers, smartphones and tablets
